backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining Movie type and implementing CRUD operations for movies and user lists, including search, add/remove from list, and sample data seeding functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including homepage hero section, movie rows, navigation bar, detail page, search functionality, and My List feature with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose and functionality in the Netflix-inspired movie recap application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining Netflix-inspired dark theme color palette using OKLCH color system for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, movie detail, and my list pages, wrapped in dark theme provider with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Netflix-style hero banner component displaying featured movie with backdrop image, gradient overlays, title, metadata, and action buttons for reading recap.
frontend/src/components/MovieCard.tsx: Movie card component with poster image, hover effects revealing title and metadata, and add-to-list button with loading states.
frontend/src/components/MovieRow.tsx: Horizontal scrollable row of movie cards with category title and left/right arrow navigation buttons that appear on hover.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar component with logo, nav links, search button, user icon, and mobile menu using Sheet component. Applies scroll-based background styling.
frontend/src/components/SearchModal.tsx: Modal dialog for searching movies with real-time results display in a grid layout. Navigates to movie detail page on selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status. Includes AuthClient configuration and delegation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyList.ts: Custom hook that combines list queries and mutations to provide utilities for checking if a movie is in the user's list and toggling list membership.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations including movie search, fetching movie details, managing user's list, adding movies, and seeding data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with Netflix-inspired color palette using OKLCH color space, custom CSS variables for theming, and scrollbar hiding utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component displaying navbar, hero section, and movie rows. Seeds sample movie data (The Dark Knight, Inception, Shawshank Redemption, etc.) on first load if database is empty.
frontend/src/pages/MovieDetailPage.tsx: Movie detail page component that displays a hero section with backdrop image, movie metadata (title, year, genre, duration), and the full recap script in a scrollable area. Includes navigation back to home and a button to add/remove the movie from the user's list.
frontend/src/pages/MyListPage.tsx: My List page component that displays a grid of saved movies with poster images, metadata overlays on hover, and remove buttons. Shows empty state when no movies are saved and handles navigation to movie detail pages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom Netflix-themed color palette (blacks, grays, red accent), extended shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting a Netflix-like movie recap app with completed features including homepage hero section, horizontal scrollable movie rows, navigation bar, detail pages, search, My List functionality, and responsive dark theme design.
